key_risks: Economic volatility in Egypt, including inflation and currency devaluation
Regulatory challenges, particularly in AML compliance and cybersecurity
Intense competition in the Egyptian banking sector
Foreign currency restrictions impacting customer transactions
controversies: Tighter limits on debit and credit card usage abroad due to foreign currency liquidity challenges
social_issues: Potential customer dissatisfaction due to new limits on card usage abroad
governance_issues: Evolving banking regulations increasing operational costs and compliance burdens
